All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractScreen
abstract base class for every screen in the game provides common functionality
Assets
Class for loading and using assets
Cell
Represents a single cell in the game grid.
GameScreen
The main game screen where the puzzle gameplay occurs.
Grid
Represents the main grid of the game where the puzzle is played
HowToPlayScreen
A screen that displays the game instructions to the player.
Main
main class of the game runs the game
MenuScreen
The main menu screen of the game.
MultiplayerClient
This is the the client, the actual player connected to the server handles client based actions
MultiplayerGameScreen
The main game screen for multiplayer mode.
MultiplayerNetwork
handles the multiplayer network communication sends the messages to clients and between server - clienbt
MultiplayerNetwork.GridCallback
callback for when grid is received
MultiplayerNetwork.GridRequest
a request for the grid
MultiplayerNetwork.GridResponse
response to the request for a grid
MultiplayerNetwork.ServerRejected
serializing server rejection message
MultiplayerNetwork.Victory
serializing victory message
MultiplayerScreen
Screen for handling multiplayer game setup and connection.
MultiplayerServer
creates the actual server for the multiplayer game handles client connections, and tracking grid states
SettingsScreen
Screen for the settings menu
SettingsScreen.ToggleSwitch
Button to determine if music is on or off
